message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.GT, cs.IT. 

The paper presents a new bandit algorithm that combines the optimal regret bounds for both adversarial and stochastic rewards. This makes it relevant to several sub-fields of computer science, including machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), data structures and algorithms (cs.DS), game theory (cs.GT), and information theory (cs.IT). However, given that the paper focuses on the performance of the algorithm in the context of multi-armed bandits, we can reasonably assume that cs.LG and cs.AI are the most likely categories.
